item.title: Why You're Always Tired (and how to fix it) - YouTube
item.description: Why You’re Always Tired (and How to Fix it) - YouTube Try obtain a consistent 7-8 hours sleep time per day.

item.title: Why Do We Get Dark Circles Under Our Eyes? - YouTube
item.description: Why Do We Get Dark Circles Under Our Eyes? - YouTube Rubbing eyes irritates blood vessels in face, causing eyebags Bursting blood vessels in the eyelids (darker blood causes shadows) References (References:: Why do we get dark circles under our eyes?

item.title: Check That Every Part of Body is Relaxed
item.description: Check That Every Part of Body is Relaxed I use a yoga/meditation trick. Check in with every part of your body to make sure it’s fully relaxed, you may find that your jaw/neck/shoulders/back are tense even when you feel like you’re already fully relaxed.

item.title: One Short, One Long Inhale, One Long Exhale
item.description: One Short, One Long Inhale, One Long Exhale Two nose inhalations (one short, followed by a loner one), then exhale.

item.title: People Had Black and White Dreams with Black and White Movies

item.title: Why Keeping the Room Cool Helps Sleep
item.description: Why Keeping the Room Cool Helps Sleep There are times during the night that you are paralyzed ([[REM Sleep]]) but also times you can move.

item.title: Why Using Melatonin Piis Bad
item.description: Why Using Melatonin Piis Bad Too much in a dose Affects sex hormones Suppresses [[Puberty]] Aids transition but doesn’t keep sleep.

item.title: Yoga Nidra
item.description: Yoga Nidra In this clip, Andrew states: “There are some interesting data published showing that these yoga nidra meditations, if you will, can upregulate some of the neurotransmitters in the brain, including dopamine, that make you prepared for action.
